"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557fae6663687224c4002e8d#post_557fae6663687224c4002e8d
You should read the supreme court transcript of the debate.  I legitimately am curious how the lawyer for the anti-gay marriage side functions in a every day setting levels complete idiot.

If it does get legalized remember this: it was only legalized cause the anti-gay marriage side put a moron in charge of their legal case.

He was such a idiot that two of the conservative judges kept trying to bail him out debate wise.
